question: Which nation is politically associated with "Operation Sangaris"?
explanation: Operation Sangaris was a military operation launched by the French military in the Central African Republic from 2013 to 2016. In 2013, United Nations Security Council unanimously voted for an African-led International Support Mission to the Central African Republic (MISCA) to restore order and end religious tensions caused by Seleka movement. MISCA was supported by France.
